name: FlexSpaces: RIA Clients for Alfresco
short_description:
Multi-platform Flex/AIR based RIA Clients for Alfresco. Desktop AIR, in
browser, portlets, and Mobile (Android and iOS) versions. 

Download and Source now only available at:
www.code.google.com/p/flexspaces

Developed by Integrated Semantics:
  integratedsemantics.org  (blog)
  integratedsemantics.com
